operations.description: Gets the available metrics for namespaces
operations.name: Microsoft.EventGrid/namespaces/providers/Microsoft.Insights/metricDefinitions/read

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The number of events published successfully to a topic or topic space within a namespace.
metricSpecifications.name: SuccessfulPublishedEvents

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The number of events that weren't accepted by Event Grid. This count excludes events that were published but failed to reach Event Grid due to a network issue, for example.
metricSpecifications.name: FailedPublishedEvents

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The total number of events that were successfully returned to (received by) clients by Event Grid.
metricSpecifications.name: SuccessfulReceivedEvents

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The number of events that were requested by clients but weren't delivered successfully by Event Grid.
metricSpecifications.name: FailedReceivedEvents

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The number of events for which delivery was successfully acknowledged by clients.
metricSpecifications.name: SuccessfulAcknowledgedEvents

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The number of events for which acknowledgements from clients failed.
metricSpecifications.name: FailedAcknowledgedEvents

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The number of events that were released successfully by queue subscriber clients.
metricSpecifications.name: SuccessfulReleasedEvents

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The number of events for which release failed.
metricSpecifications.name: FailedReleasedEvents

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The observed latency in milliseconds for publish events operation.
metricSpecifications.name: PublishLatencyInMilliseconds

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The observed latency in milliseconds for acknowledge events operation.
metricSpecifications.name: AcknowledgeLatencyInMilliseconds

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The observed latency in milliseconds for receive events operation.
metricSpecifications.name: ReceiveLatencyInMilliseconds

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The observed latency in milliseconds for reject events operation.
metricSpecifications.name: RejectLatencyInMilliseconds

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The number of MQTT requests.
metricSpecifications.name: Mqtt.RequestCount

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The number of  MQTT messages that were published successfully into the namespace.
metricSpecifications.name: Mqtt.SuccessfulPublishedMessages

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The number of MQTT messages that failed to be published into the namespace.
metricSpecifications.name: Mqtt.FailedPublishedMessages

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The number of messages delivered by the namespace. There are no failures for this operation.
metricSpecifications.name: Mqtt.SuccessfulDeliveredMessages

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The number of active connections in the namespace.
metricSpecifications.name: Mqtt.Connections

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The number of successful subscription operations (Subscribe, Unsubscribe). This metric is incremented for every topic filter within a subscription request.
metricSpecifications.name: Mqtt.SuccessfulSubscriptionOperations

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The number of failed subscription operations (Subscribe, Unsubscribe). This metric is incremented for every topic filter within a subscription request.
metricSpecifications.name: Mqtt.FailedSubscriptionOperations

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The number of bytes published to or delivered by the namespace.
metricSpecifications.name: Mqtt.Throughput

operations.name: Microsoft.EventGrid/namespaces/clientGroups/write
